translations: v．担任队长：在团队、组织或船只中担任领导角色。
· He is captaining the football team.

phrs.translation: 库克船长（英国探险家和航海家）

sentences.sentence: So I can see him captaining this club in the future.
sentences.translation: 因此我认为他很有希望成为球队未来的队长。

sentences.sentence: You cannot get any higher than captaining your country.
sentences.translation: 没有什么比国家队队长更高的目标可以去争取了。

sentences.sentence: To this day, one of my proudest achievements is captaining my country.
sentences.translation: 直到这一天，我最骄傲的成就是成为英格兰队的队长。
